official_title: Real-Time Optical Biopsy for Improved Lung Cancer Diagnosis
inclusion_criteria:
* Participants will be drawn from the pool of patients who have suspicious lesions identified on CT and who are already scheduled for a lung biopsy procedure with Dr. Woodhead or one of his colleagues
* Patients will be asked to consent to 2 to 3 extra biopsy samples to be used for this research project
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: - Excluded from this study will be minors below age 18, prisoners, pregnant women, patients with a contraindication for additional lung biopsies, and patients who cannot give informed consent (language barrier, cognitive impairment, etc.)
